about_the_game:
DropDisk is a free-to-play background idle clicker game in which you click and battle to gain XP. XP improves your level which improves your chances of receiving greater rewards.

Features


Drops occur every 3 hours.

Battle's open every 10 minutes.

Levels 1-25, 1 earns basic rewards. 25 has greatest chance of high tier rewards!

Sound notifications to let you know when a battle is ready or a new disk has been collected!

Achievements!

AutoClickers!

Trade Disks on the Steam Community Market!

Collected disks can be equipped in game as skins!

Submit your designs via the Steam Workshop, for the community to vote, approved submissions will be added to the game!

Disks received in DropDisk are a Steam Community Market good with value determined by the community.

Drop Table:

Level 1-4:
  • Common: 60%
  • Uncommon: 33&
  • Rare: 6.999%
  • Epic: 1/ 5,000,000
  • Legendary: 1/30,000,000
Level 5-10:
  • Common: 53%
  • Uncommon: 40%
  • Rare: 6.999%
  • Epic: 1/ 5,000,000
  • Legendary: 1/30,000,000
Level 11-14:
  • Common: 59%
  • Uncommon: 32.333%
  • Rare: 8.333%
  • Epic: 1/ 5,000,000
  • Legendary: 1/30,000,000
Level 15-24:
  • Common: 57.589%
  • Uncommon: 35.461%
  • Rare: 6.999%
  • Epic: 1/3,525,000
  • Legendary: 1/28,200,000
Level 25:
  • Common: 52%
  • Uncommon: 35%
  • Rare: 12.999%
  • Epic: 1/2,500,000
  • Legendary: 1/25,000,000
Drop tables, XP earning rates, battle timers, and drop timers are subject to change.

Collectible Disks

name: DropDisk

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 / 8 / 9 / 10
  • Processor: 2 GHz Dual Core
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 512MB+
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

short_description: DropDisk is a F2P Idle Clicking Game for collecting Floppy Disks. Click to gain XP, battle to gain more XP, the more XP the higher your level, the higher your level the better your Disk drops to collect and trade!
